2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Overview

Did you miss the return of Colossus last August? Were you the guy who said, "This book's never going to stay on schedule, so you waited for the trade paperback? Are you insane?! How can you wait!? Folks, if you're missing this, you're missing the best comic in comics right now (by someones opinion)! But, it's not too late to jump on board.

Just moments after Blindfold’s enigmatic warning, all of the telepaths and psychics in the Institute suffer a simultaneous attack, which knocks them out leaving them unable to reawaken. While the team moves them to the infirmary, miles away, a Sentinel which had been found by a local comes online, bursting forth from the barn where it had been kept. Lacking all limbs but its left arm, the Sentinel begins to drags itself toward the Institute… and its “Lord.” At the Institute, the X-Men are taking stock of their situation – the psychic attack and the still-missing student, Wing, and the inexplicable total communications blackout – when Lockheed arrives, warning them of an intrusion. When the X-Men go to investigate, they find the arriving Sentinel, who attacks both them and the school. Cyclops is able to eliminate its threat with a powerful optic blast and then order Wolverine to finish it off, while he and Colossus check on the students, whom he told Kitty to take to the Danger Room for safety. Wolverine makes short work but, before delivering the final blow, hears the unusually talkative Sentinel speak of its “Lord” and that the “children will pay for the father’s sins.” Racing back to the school, Wolverine finds that the other X-Men cannot gain entrance to the Danger Room and the children inside. As they theorize that their enemy is inside, Emma arrives with the Beast, explaining that the Danger Room itself is their enemy and that it is angry. Inside, the Danger Room has reanimated the corpse of Wing, shocking the rest of the students. Elsewhere, Special Agent Brand is awaiting the decision of the S.W.O.R.D. committee when she is visited by another agent, who informs here of the complete loss of all monitoring devices in the school.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Dangerous, Part 2

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: The secrets are OUT when Captain America and Jessica Jones confront the Young Avengers' parents about their children's double lives. Meanwhile, the unsuspecting kids find themselves on the front lines of a savage drug war against one of the Marvel Universe's most powerful, chemically-enhanced antagonists. Even if they survive, who's going to save them from their parents?
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Secret Identities (Part 2)

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Kurt's journey along the winding way begins in earnest as he, buddy Logan, and hottie nurse Christine Palmer travel to the eerie forests of Bavaria, where our favorite blue elf was raised by the gypsy enchantress, Margali Szardos. But what are the dark forces compelling Kurt to revisit his past? 
 
Kurt and Logan have gone to Wizeldorf in Bavaria, Germany with Nurse Palmer tagging along. We see scenes from Kurt's toddlerhood and adolescence, including a waterered-down version of how Stefan made Kurt promise to kill him if he ever turned evil and took an innocent life that was revealed in X-Men (first series) Annual #4. The Szardos are erroneously referred to as Kurt's "step", instead of "foster", mother/brother/sister. Stefan's name is misspelled "Stephen". Kurt's old circus may be in terrible trouble.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: The Winding Way, Part 2: Dark Carnival

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: "MOTHERLESS COUNTRY" The all-new Scorpion follows the only clue to her dark past halfway around the world to exotic Madripoor-- and smack-dab into trouble with the local Triad crime lords! Will her first mission for S.H.I.E.L.D. be her last?
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Motherless Country

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: One kills vampires. One kills mobsters. The Punisher isn't a vampire, Blade isn't a mobster--it SEEMS like these two would get along swimmingly. But will they? And how does this all tie in with the Ringmaster's plans for world domination?
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Master Of The Ring, Part 2

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: "CRUEL AND UNUSUAL" Guest-Starring STEVE ROGERS, the One True CAPTAIN AMERICA! Together, CAPTAIN AMERICA and the NEW INVADERS journey to the frozen north to prevent the fulfillment of an ancient Atlantean prophecy that will sink the entire surface world beneath the waves! This is the issue where EVERYTHING changes. Part 2 (of 3).
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Cruel and Unusual (Part 2 of 3)

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Enter: SearchMan! When his entire battalion of warriors is wiped out by a MegaMan impostor, he comes to DenTech City looking for the real MegaMan. The surviving Net warrior is big and bad, and he won't rest until he's exacted his revenge.

Unable to defend himself--or convince SearchMan of his innocence--MegaMan needs help, and he needs it fast. To his rescue come a couple of unlikely heroes--two brothers living in the junkyard, SpoutMan and BubbleMan!

Who or what is this 'Dark Megaman,' and why is he attacking the real Mega's friends?

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 1: Impact! The True DarkNavi Appears
  • Chapter 2: The Other MegaMan?!
  • Chapter 3: GutsMan, Swallowed by Darkness!!
  • Chapter 4: MegaMan DS Revealed
  • Chapter 5: When Hate Becomes Power!!
  • Chapter 6: Counterattack of the Ultimate Duo!!
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Life-And-Death Battles

As the preliminaries to the third phase of the Journeyman Ninja Selection Exams begin, the student ninja face off against each other in no-holds-barred, one-on-one bouts. Deaf to Sakura's pleas to withdraw from the contest and despite the crippling effects of the curse placed on him by the nefarious Orochimaru, Sasuke enters the first match against one of the vicious Sound Ninja spies. But with his signature fighting techniques suddenly off-limits, how can Sasuke possibly prevail? And even if he manages to survive the violent brawl, Orochimaru's curse is threatening to change Sasuke forever!

Chapter Titles

  • Number 64: Lord Hokage's Message...!!
  • Number 65: Life-and-Death Battles!!
  • Number 66: Sakura's Advice
  • Number 67: Unholy Gifts!
  • Number 68: Blood of the Uchiha
  • Number 69: The Deadly Visitor!!
  • Number 70: The One Who Dies!!
  • Number 71: The Insurmountable Wall...!!
  • Number 72: Rivals...!!
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Life-and-Death Battles

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
It's voodoo chaos in the Big Easy as the reanimated dead are crawling out of their graves and overrunning the streets. Gambit may be the only person who can save the city from an undead apocalypse, but he’s got bigger problems at the moment: two women, both heartbroken, both angry, and both demanding his head on a platter.

The linving dead are overrunning New Orleans, but that isn't so bad. After all, zombies are slow and stupid and not even close to a match for somebody like Remy LeBeau, the mutant super hero known as Gambit. not only that, Gambit has mystically powered backup from another local hero, Brother Voodoo, and between the two of thel, an army of zombies is something they can easily handle.

But things get complicated with the appearance of one zombie in particular: the reanimated corpse of a young mutant named Emery Arcenaux. Emery's powers made him invulnerable when he was alive... but at least he could be reasoned with. Now Emery is back from the grave, a mindless murder machine. Gambit can't hurt Emery, can't touch Emery, and certainly can't kill him. So how in the world is Gambit supposed to stop him?!
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Hath No Fury, Part 2: Down Among the Dead Men

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
The century-spanning war between Midland and Chuder continues unabated. The two warring kingdoms, vying for supremacy, launch headfirst into what will become the final battle. Leading the Midland forces are the Band of the Hawk, lead by the charismatic Griffith, with the fearless Guts as his trusted champion. But should the Hawks triumph again on the battlefield, the war with Chuder may end, but the secret war within Midland may begin as those who seek to rise within the court see the ambitious Griffith as an obstacle to obtaining power. And nothing is more formidable than an enemy unseen!

Chapter Titles

  • The Battle For Doldrey, Chapter 5
  • The Battle For Doldrey, Chapter 6
  • Triumphant Return
  • Moment of Glory
  • Tombstone of Flame, Chapter 1
  • Tombstone of Flame, Chapter 2
  • One Snowy Night
  • The Morning Departure, Chapter 1
  • The Morning Departure, Chapter 2
  • The Morning Departure, Chapter 3
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Beet, Poala, and Kissu are on a journey to the New Continent! But hitching a ride in an airplane proves to be a turbulent trip--the Vandel, Balleus, wants to eat the machine, and he won't rest until he snags his snack! During the confusion, Poala gets stuck with the Broad Buster, Milfa, while Beet and Kissu team up with some local Busters to keep the beaches clean. Beet needs his wits about him as a pack of powerful Vandels descends on the town with him as their target--what a time to discover one of the Zenon Warriors is alive!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 27: Put the Ocean Devils to Rout!!
  • Chapter 28: Bekatrute Calls Forth the Storm!!
  • Chapter 29: Thrill of the Immovable Giant!!
  • Special Event: BEET THE WORLD Part 5
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Call Forth the Storm

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Hakufu's bathroom brawl against the ever-creepy Kannei continues and just when it looks like her fighting career has gone down the toilet, Saji Genpou lends a hand...which then gets impaled. Saji kicks the crap out of Kannei and Kannei makes a run for it. As many Toushi are taken down, several new characters show up, including a female archer! Don't miss the next Battle Vixens with so much excitement it just can't be held in.

Back Blurb

Hakufu's bathroom brawl against the ever-creepy Kannei continues! Just when it looks like her fighting career has gone down the toilet, Hakufu receives a helping hand that may wipe out her rival. As many Toushi are taken down, several new characters show up, including a dangerous new threat that leads to one very important bathing scene!

Chapters 48 to 54.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Ten-year-old magical prodigy and girls’ school instructor Negi Springfield has a new secret...and some of his more stubborn students are determined to uncover it. Few know that Negi has magical powers. (In fact, he’ll be turned into a weasel if he is officially found out). No wonder Negi is so cautious while taking magic lessons from the so-good-at-being-bad Evangeline. As one of the few students who actually knows about his special abilities, Asuna is the one girl to whom Negi decides to tell yet another secret–one involving Negi’s long-lost father who disappeared years ago. But what connection can there possibly be between the Thousand Master and Asuna?

Chapter Titles

  • Sixty-Third Period: (Secret) Tower For Two♥
  • Sixty-Fourth Period: After That Magic-Teacher!
  • Sixty-Fifth Period: My Very Own Superhero
  • Sixty-Sixth Period: The Truth of That Snowy Day
  • Sixty-Seventh Period: Rub-a-Dub-Dub, There's Slime in the Tub
  • Sixty-Eighth Period: It Was a Dark and Stormy Visitor
  • Sixty-Ninth Period: The Attack Begins! Negi and Kotarō
  • Seventieth Period: A Reason to Fight
  • Seventy-First Period: Negi's Choice
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: The Worst Kept Secret In the World

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
The sergeant's biggest menace has been Natsumi, Earth's first line of defense. When Sgt. Keroro finally discovers her weakness, it's up to Fuyuki to defend Earth. And...why haven't the Keron Troops invaded Pokopen? It's because they lack the manpower, of course! Never one to waste an opportunity, Keroro is off to the zoo to recruit reinforcements for his platoon and he takes Kururu's latest invention with him!

Chapter Titles

  • Encounter LXII: Natsumi In Crisis! A New Biological Weapon!
  • Encounter LXIII: Power Outage! Operation: Beat the Heat!
  • Encounter LXIV: Body Alteration! Operation: Door-To-Door Sales
  • Encounter LXV: Impulse Buy! My Poorly Maintained Wings!
  • Encounter LXVI: Operation: Hijack--Manga-Writer Style!
  • Encounter LXVII: The Charge of the Animal Brigade!
  • Encounter LXVIII: Media Attack! Operation: Welcoming Party!
  • Encounter LXIX: For Today's Youth: A Dose of Cold, Harsh Reality
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Everything seems to be going smoothly when Hugo awakes, but the arrival of the Zexen Knights to the Grasslander's base marks the first signs of trouble. Meanwhile, the strains between Chris and Hugo's relationship are pushed deeper as questions about the relationship between Chris and the chieftain of the Lizard Clan brought to light. Nonetheless, they are forced to be comrades-at-arms and a bond may reduce the bad blood between the two when Chris confronts Hugo about her father.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Proper Japanese Title: Majo no Agito (魔女の顎門)

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 40: "Fit for Battle, Part 4" (闘う資格 Ⅳ "Tatakau Shikaku IV")
  • Chapter 41: "The Witch's Maw, Part 1" (魔女の顎門 Ⅰ "Majo no Agito I")
  • Chapter 42: "The Witch's Maw, Part 2" (魔女の顎門 Ⅱ "Majo no Agito II")
  • Chapter 43: "The Witch's Maw, Part 3" (魔女の顎門 Ⅲ "Majo no Agito III")

  • Chapter 45: "The Witch's Maw, Part 5" (魔女の顎門 Ⅴ "Majo no Agito V")
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Majo no Agito

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Proper Japanese Title: Musume no Kareshi wa Toriaezu Naguttoke (娘の彼氏はとりあえず殴っとけ)

Chapter Titles

  • Lesson 059. "Always Knock Before Opening the Bathroom Door" (トイレに入るときはまずノック "Toire ni Hairu Toki wa Mazu Nokku")
  • Lesson 060. "You Can't Judge a Movie by Its Title" (タイトルだけじゃ映画の面白さはわからない "Taitoru Dake Jya Eiga no Omoshirosa wa Wakaranai")
  • Lesson 061. "You Know What Happens if You Pee on a Worm" (みみずにおしっこかけると腫れるよ "Mimizu ni Oshikko Kakeru to Hareru yo")
  • Lesson 062. "You Only Live With Your Father for About Twenty Years...So Be Nice to Him!" (せいぜい一緒に過ごす期間なんて二十年くらいなんだから娘さんはお父さんを大切にしてあげて "Seizei Issho ni Sugosu Kikai Nante Jyuujinen Kurai Nan da Kara Musume-san wa Otōsan wo Taisetsu ni Shite Agete")
  • Lesson 063. "Just Slug Your Daughter's Boyfriend and Get It Over With" (娘の彼氏はとりあえず殴っとけ "Musume no Kareshi wa Toriaezu Naguttoke")
  • Lesson 064. "Make Characters So Anybody Can Tell Who They Are Just By Their Silhouettes" (キャラクターはシルエットだけで読者に見分けがつくように描き分けよう"Kyarakutā wa Shiruetto Dake de Dokusha ni Miwake ga Tukuyō ni Kakiwakeyō")
  • Lesson 065. "You Can't Judge a Person By His Appearance, Either" (外見だけで人を判断しちゃダメ "Gaiken Dake de Hito wo Handan Shicha Dame")
  • Lesson 066. "Do Cherries Come From Cherry Trees?" (さくらんぼってアレ桜の木になるの? "Sakuranbo tte Are Sakura no Ki ni Naru no?")
  • Lesson 067. "Why are Masochists So Tough?" (Mってある意味 無敵 "Emu tte Aru Imi Muteki")
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Just Slug Your Daughter's Boyfriend and Get It Over With

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Translates X-Treme X-Men #36-46.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: X-Treme X-Men

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Tired of Sano and Mizuki taking their relationship so slow, Julia confronts Sano to get him moving faster. But Sano has more things to worry about...his younger brother, Shin, has run away from home! Then, when a photo of Minami, Nakatsu and Sano appears in a girls' fashion magazine, the men of Hana-Kimi find themselves stalked...and propositioned!

Chapters 37-42 & bonus story "Everyday Life".
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Male Models

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Makoto doit s’occuper de gros clients américains et ne peut donc pas rentrer chez lui le soir. Il décide de louer une suite à l’hôtel pour Yura et lui, histoire de joindre l’utile à l’agréable. Mais il se trouve que l’un des hommes d’affaire américain est venu avec sa fille (plutôt jolie) et que cette dernière trouve Makoto à son goût... Questions cruciales de ce volume : quelles sont les différences entre le vagin d’une japonaise et celui d’une occidentale ? Quelles sont les mensurations idéales d’une femme ?

Titres de Chapitre

  • Chapitre 71 - Dîner d'affaires ♥
  • Chapitre 72 - Première fois ♥
  • Chapitre 73 - Yura a disparu !
  • Chapitre 74 - La maman de Yura ☆
  • Chapitre 75 - Attention aux pervers !
  • Chapitre 76 - Bien proportionnée !
  • Chapitre 77 - Un week-end à la campagne ♥
  • Chapitre 78 - Les amours de Jun ♥
  • Chapitre 79 - Yura est enceinte !?
  • Chapitre 80 - Massages torrides
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Tome 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Titres de Chapitre

  • FILE 45 - Le Retour d'Amamiya Kazuhiko - 6
  • FILE 46 - Le Retour d'Amamiya Kazuhiko - 7
  • FILE 47 - Les Anges - 1
  • FILE 48 - Les Anges - 2
  • FILE 49 - Les Anges - 3
  • FILE 50 - Les Anges - 4
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Tome 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Megumi's best friend Miki has been forced into an arranged marriage with Takao Gakusan, a good-looking, rich, dignified young man, but Megumi isn't buying his nice-guy act. After careful--and not to mention risky--spying, er, research, Megumi learns that Miki's soon-to-be-husband is actually a mean, arrogant, greedy scoundrel! There's still time to prevent the wedding, but Megumi's only hope of doing so is to engage the help of her very faithful, but very inept, friends....
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 56: Desire
  • Chapter 57: Arch Rival
  • Chapter 58: Soar
  • Chapter 59: Last Piece
  • Chapter 60: Mokichi

  • Chapter 62: Hope and Despair
  • Chapter 63: The Moon and the Ring
  • Chapter 64: Heavy Rain
  • Chapter 65: Light
  • Chapter 66: Bruised Apple
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 71: Shinichin kannoilla
  • Chapter 72: Pimeyden ruhtinas
  • Chapter 73: Viruksen valta
  • Chapter 74: Naamion alla
  • Chapter 75: Kanin kyyneleet
  • Chapter 76: Tuulen tuiverrusta vaan?
  • Chapter 77: Pudotuksen salaisuus
  • Chapter 78: Yhdet häät ja yhdet hautajaiset
  • Chapter 79: Kielletty sitruunatee?!
  • Chapter 80: Hyokkäyksen syy
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Young Psychic Haruhiko has unknowingly failed to intercept his revealing letter to Tamura. The letter convinces Mrs. Yakushimaru to allow her sons, including the psychic Mikuro, to aid Tamura. But when Mikuro mysteriously slips Haruhiko a warning, Haruhiko thinks he's Rin's ally. Once he sees the note, Rin calls out Tamura and Mikuro. Into the middle of the resulting psychic battle enters Haruhiko. Can he convince Rin to stop? Will his diseased heart survive if he doesn't?
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Their desperate quest to uncover the secrets of their pasts takes them to a tiny desert town in Arizona called Gallows Bell. The horrifying reality that awaits them there could be more shocking than they can handle!
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: The Third Revelation: Gallows Bell

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Tsuzuki and Hisoka are still caught up in the horror at the university as the evil Dr. Muraki's diabolical cloning experiments continue. Muraki has joined forces with a modern-day Frankenstein in order to resurrect an old enemy and exact a vicious revenge. When Tsuzuki tries to interfere, Muraki takes his mind and body captive. Can Hisoka rescue him from the doctor's clutches before Tsuzuki's final act of desperation destroys them all?

Chapter 24 - 27 & bonus story Professor Watari's Road To Discovery.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 66: Three Dimensions (三次元 "Sanjigen")
  • Chapter 67: Indebted (借り "Kari")
  • Chapter 68: Elegance (美学 "Bigaku")
  • Chapter 69: No, Not That One (ダメだよ "Dame da yo")
  • Chapter 70: The Best Man for the Job (適任 "Tekinin")
  • Chapter 71: Four Years Ago (Part 1) (4年前(前編) "4 Nen Mae (Zenpen)")
  • Chapter 72: Four Years Ago (Part 2) (4年前(中編) "4 Nen Mae (Chūhen)")
  • Chapter 73: Four Years Ago (Part 3) (4年前(後編) "4 Nen Mae (Kōhen)")
  • Chapter 74: The Ougi Clan (扇一族 "Ōgi Ichizoku")
  • Chapter 75: Decision (決定 "Kettei")
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description:
Rain Cats and Dogs

Everybody has a dream, and for Shô Kazamatsuri, that dream is simple: he wants to be the best soccer player he can possibly be. He's the spirited leader of the Josui Junior High team and everyone looks up to him. In turn, he tries to keep the team together at any cost!

Shô finds out a secret about Tatsuya's family that not even Tatsuya knows! Soon the conflict of interest turns into a conflict on the field. Matching the stormy moods on the team, the weather takes a turn for the worse, and Josui's players must overcome muddy fields and bad attitudes if they hope to achieve victory in the most important game of the district tournament!
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Rain Cats and Dogs

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Chapters 132-150
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8

2005-01-01|2005-12-30.description: Chapter 69 - 78.
2005-01-01|2005-12-30.name: Vol. 8
